Text: I dont sign in often but I wanted to today to thank you for your torrents I like your taste in comics keep up the excellent work !!!!
aye mdusanjay is the man indeed
Agreed.  One of the top two or three that I prefer to download from above all the others.

seriously, thanks.  This UL turned me onto Heavy Metal: Four horsemen of the apocalypse, Irresistible & got the 2nd issue of Idolized quickly after I asked if he could get it after I forgot the name of it & somebody responded ASAP.  Thanks, again!
